summary:
Two automaton androids for you to command.
-Not lore friendly-
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[b][size=22pt][color=red]Note: I've ended all support for this mod to work on other projects.[/color][/b][/size]

[b][size=20pt][color=Mediumseagreen]A[/color][color=white].[/color][color=Mediumseagreen]S[/color][color=white].[/color][color=Mediumseagreen]A[/color][color=white].[/color][color=Mediumseagreen]K[/color][color=white].[/color][color=Mediumseagreen]A[/color] & [color=dodgerblue]DIENBII[/color][/size][/b]
[color=orange]
[b]Don't be afraid to add screenshots![/b][/color]
____________________________________________________________________________________________
[img]http://i.imgur.com/zAp3fLvl.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s2.postimg.org/wu25dnqxl/infor_An_D.jpg[/img]
-NOT LORE FRIENDLY. IF YOU'RE A LORE PURIST, TURN BACK NOW. THINGS ARE GOING TO GET CRAZY-


Long ago, the Dwemer created two automaton in the image of the Akaviri as an experiment. After the Dwemer disappeared, the automaton continued to roam free in Skyrim, using their humanoid-like wit to learn and adapt to human life, awaiting the day that a Dragonborn would claim them as their master.

Are you willing to take them under your wing?


[size=10pt][color=orange][b] HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR USE WITH THESE FOLLOWERS[/b][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url][/size]

More images here:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/254576/?]-CLICK-[/url]

[color=gold]__________________________________________________________________________[/color]

[b]FEATURES:[/b]
This mod adds 2 standalone followers to the game,
Asaka (Autonomous Supersonic Automaton Kicks Ass) and Dienbii.
Asaka is a shock style user with 2 new spells while Dienbii is a fire style user with 2 new spells.


[b]New spells list:[/b]


Overdrive Asaka - Pretty much a shock cloak without the overbearing effects

Overdrive Dienbii - Pretty much a flame cloak without the overbearing effects

Die and Bass - Fires a music-imbued electrified shockwave at your target

Fly Away - Fires a music-imbued flame shockwave at your target

[b]New items list:[/b]
Fist of Electrification - While equipped, the user's punches deal shock damage.

Fist of Flames - While equipped, the user's punches deal fire damage.

[size=3pt][b]The eyes are now included (along with many other colors and eye types)
in my Eye pack, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37151//?]Undiv-eyes[/url][/b][/size]


[color=gold]_________________________________________________________________________[/color]
LOCATION:
WHITERUN HALL OF THE DEAD CATACOMBS

[b][size=13pt]INSTALLATION:[/size][/b]
Either use NMM to install it or drop the contents of the .rar into your data folder


[b][size=10pt]UPGRADING FROM PREVIOUS VERSIONS:[/size][/b]
Dismiss Asaka and Dienbii. Fast travel to another location. save, Remove the old version,
install the new version.

__________________________________________________________________________________________

[center][/center]
[/center]
author: Undivide

files.name: Asaka and Dienbii - Music replacement
